      • getFileOnSD

        public static java.io.File getFileOnSD(java.lang.String folder,
                       java.lang.String filename)
                                throws java.lang.Exception
        Returns a file on SD card. Creates it if not exists.
        Parameters:
        folder - The file's folder, relative to the cache directory.
        filename - The file's name.
        Returns:
        The file.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If SD-card does not exist

      • sendGetRequest

        public static java.lang.String sendGetRequest(org.apache.http.impl.client.DefaultHttpClient httpClient,
                              java.lang.String url)
        Gets a document from a URL and returns the source code as text.
        Parameters:
        httpClient - HTTP client used to fetch the document.
        url - The documents URL
        Returns:
        The document's source/the requests response

      • writeFile

             java.lang.String content)
        Writes a String to a text file.
        Parameters:
        file - The target file.
        content - The text content to be written.
